snippet: Jennifer Jones Austin co-chairs the transition team with a vantage point informed by both the establishment and the left that also characterizes Bill de Blasio’s career.
abstract: Jennifer Jones Austin, who was named by New York City Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio to co-chair his transition team, has a vantage point informed by both the establishment and the left; she is a lawyer brought up by a civil rights activist father but has also had a long career working under Mayors Rudolph W Giuliani and Michael R Bloomberg.
lead_paragraph: Jennifer Jones Austin co-chairs the transition team with a vantage point informed by both the establishment and the left that also characterizes Bill de Blasio’s career.

headline.main: Experience has Taught Jones Austin the Power of Community
headline.print_headline:
Atop de Blasio’s Transition Team, Two Leaders With Roots in Social Justice: Her Experience
Taught Power
Of Community
